mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT R.MID, R.HNAME, INDATE, OUTDATE, HPRICE, (H.HPRICE * (OUTDATE - INDATE)) PRICE FROM HRESERVATION R, HOTEL H WHERE H.HNAME = R.HNAME) WHERE HNAME = #{hname}
SELECT R.HNAME, R.INDATE, R.OUTDATE, H.HPRICE, (H.HPRICE * (OUTDATE - INDATE)) PRICE FROM HRESERVATION R, HOTEL H WHERE H.HNAME = R.HNAME AND MID = #{mid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM HRESERVATION WHERE MID = #{mid} AND HNAME = #{hname} AND INDATE = #{indate}
